title: Aux::CodeCommit#data
description: A CodeCommit record for a version control system

repository_name.description: The name of the repository in which the commit can be found

sha.description: The SHA hash of the commit

message.description: The commit message of the commit

author.description: Information about the author of the commit

name.description: The name of the author of the commit

email.description: The email address associated with the commit's author

date.description: The date and time at which the commit was authored

avatar_url.description: The URL pointing to the author's avatar

committer.description: Information about the committer of the commit

name.description: The name of the committer of the commit

email.description: The email address associated with the commit's committer

date.description: The date and time at which the commit was authored

avatar_url.description: The URL pointing to the committer's avatar

diff.description: General information about the diff data on the commit

files_changed.description: The number of files involved in the commit, including additions, deletions, and modifications

additions.description: The sum total of additions made in the commit

deletions.description: The sum total of deletions made in the commit

parents.description: A list of the parent nodes of the commit

sha.description: The SHA hash of the parent commit
